revised_title: Magnetic Observations at the Valencia Observatory and Diffusion of Salts in Solution
tldr: This article presents the mean results of monthly magnetic element determinations at the Valencia Observatory, Cahirciveen. It also discusses an experiment on the diffusion of salts in solution, using a specific apparatus to measure the diffusion without intermixing at the common surface. The findings contribute to the understanding of magnetic observations and the study of salt diffusion in solutions.
